# kssbox

## Introduction

JUST FOR TEST

## Usage

``` bash
pip install kssbox
```

```python
from kssbox import main

print(main.add(1,2))
```

## 更新

``` bash
# 构建
python3 -m build

# 上传
python3 -m twine upload dist/*

```
